name: storm-drain

effect.x_y: Redirects water moves without negating them or granting any Special Attack boost. Does not redirect hidden power.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Redirects water moves without negating them or granting any Special Attack boost. Does not redirect hidden power.

short_effect: Redirects single-target water moves to this Pok√©mon where possible. Absorbs Water moves, raising Special Attack one stage.

flavor_text.x_y: Draws in all Water-type moves to boost its Sp. Atk stat.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Draws in all Water-type moves to boost its Sp. Atk stat.
